desc: We sell pro-grade stuff at an affordable price with an unheard-of LIFETIME guarantee on literally everything in our store. Come take a look and let's build something together!

layout.text: Nova Pro Supply is now Phyxology Supply
We only make and sell high-quality stuff, that is why we offer a lifetime satisfaction guarantee on all our products. If you're not happy for any reason, just reach out and we'll make it right!
